highlights.name: Tour around the dam area
highlights.details: The visit might require some time.

locations.name: Shoshone Point
locations.description: Grand Canyon overlook with great views and less tourists due to a (shortish) walk from the parking area.

highlights.name: Early morning breakfast picnic
highlights.description: No tourists, beautiful scenery, why not eat something...

locations.name: Hermits Rest
locations.description: The endpoint of the Rim trail, an 8-mile hiking trip along the canyon. A shuttle bus takes back to the starting point.

locations.name: Bryce Canyon
locations.description: A place full of cool red towering rock formations. Start from Canyon car park and walk along the rim and then down into the Queenâ€™s Garden and up Wall Street.

locations.name: Zion national park
locations.description: Canyons, red rocks, hiking route with some nice views. Mule riding trips are also available!

locations.name: Badwater Basin
locations.description: The lowest point of North America (-85.5 m below sea level). In Death Valley

locations.name: Tioga Pass
locations.description: A passage from Death Valley to the Yosemite national park

locations.name: Maswik Lodge
locations.description: A bit cheaper accommodation at Grand Canyon NP

locations.name: Bright Angel Lodge
locations.description: Another a bit cheaper lodge, looks old but cool

locations.name: Purple Sage Motel
locations.description: Supposively a friendly, clean, and inexpensive motel.
